name: soulsifter
description: Scripts for automating builds of the backend & fronted of SoulSifter app.

scripts.all: npm run buildnumber && cd be && npm run be:compile && cd ../fe && npm run fe:start
scripts.branch: git checkout -b $(echo $npm_package_version | cut -d. -f1,2) && npm run bump:patch && git checkout master
scripts.bump:internal: npm version --no-git-tag-version $version_type && cd fe && npm version --no-git-tag-version $version_type && cd ../be && npm version --no-git-tag-version $version_type && cd .. && git add package* fe/package* be/package* && git commit -m "bump $version_type"
scripts.package: npm run buildnumber && cd fe && npm run fe:package
scripts.packagedebug: npm run buildnumber && cd fe && npm run fe:packagedebug
scripts.release: PREV_VERSION=$(git describe --abbrev=0 --tags) && cd be && npm run be:compile && cd ../fe && npm run fe:build && npm run fe:make && git log --pretty=format:'* %s' $PREV_VERSION..HEAD
scripts.start: npm run buildnumber && cd fe && npm run fe:start
scripts.startforge: npm run buildnumber && cd fe && npm run fe:startforge
scripts.test: npm run buildnumber && cd be && npm run be:test

author: Robert Neale
